author: Mike Chiari
title: WWE WrestleMania 36: Predicting Match Order for Saturday and Sunday Cards
description: WrestleMania 36 on April 4 and 5 will be perhaps the most unique WrestleMania of all time, and a big reason for that is the fact that it is being broken up into two nights...
content:
Etsuo Hara/Getty Images
WrestleMania 36 on April 4 and 5 will be perhaps the most unique WrestleMania of all time, and a big reason for that is the fact that it is being broken up into two nights.
The event will stay in Florida, but the coronavirus pandemic… [+5698 chars]
